name: NSWindow.AnimationBehavior
desc: Constants that control the automatic window animation behavior windows use when ordering to the front or out of view.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The automatic animation that’s appropriate to the window type. This is the default.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No automatic animation used. This may be useful when you perform your own window animation.

items.name: case documentWindow
items.desc: The animation behavior that’s appropriate to the document window style.

items.name: case utilityWindow
items.desc: The animation behavior that’s appropriate to the utility window style.

items.name: case alertPanel
items.desc: The animation behavior that’s appropriate to the alert window style.
